title: Traffic Information System in Korea Expressway Corporation
subTitle: Real-time traffic information updates for the Pyeongchang 2018 Winter Olympics
overviewContent: Developed a dedicated traffic information system for the Pyeongchang 2018 Winter Olympics. The system provided real-time travel time estimates based on toll and sensor data, allowing both domestic and international travellers to plan their journeys effectively. It included features to compare predicted and actual travel times and adjust predictions to improve accuracy.

jd: Analysed the existing traffic information system and identified requirements specific to the Pyeongchang 2018 Winter Olympics.
Developed features to calculate and visualise estimated travel times using toll and sensor data.
Implemented functionality to compare predicted and actual travel times and adjust predictions as needed for improved accuracy.
Collaborated with database analysts (DBAs) to integrate queries into the system.
Performed web standard validation checks, unit testing, and integration testing.
Prepared technical documentation and end-user manuals.
